properties.areaDesc: Upper Niagara River and Buffalo Harbor
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 12:41PM EST until January 9 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest to west winds 15 to 20 knots expected.

* WHERE...The Upper Niagara River and Buffalo Harbor.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to midnight EST Wednesday night.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT EST WEDNESDAY NIGHT
